mapper.select: /* ProductOrderDao.listOrderByMember */ SELECT a.order_id AS orderId , b.product_id AS productId , b.product_name AS productName , a.paid_at AS paidAt , a.created_at AS createdAt FROM product_order a, product b WHERE a.product_id = b.product_id AND a.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER by a.order_id DESC
